Synopsis: Creates a new HTML tree child counter object with specified options.
Description: This function creates a new HTML tree child counter object with the ability to customize its behavior using the provided parameters.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-HTMLTreeChildCounter -Deep
Creates a new HTML tree child counter object that counts child elements recursively.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
New-HTMLTreeChildCounter -HideZero -HideExpanded
Creates a new HTML tree child counter object that hides counters for child elements with a count of zero and expanded child elements.
